text: Genes, Brain and Behavior (also known as G2B) is a peer-reviewed scientific journal covering the fields of the genetics of behavior, the nervous system (neurogenetics), and mental illness (psychiatric genetics). It began in 2002. It is the official journal of the International Behavioural and Neural Genetics Society. == Impact == According to the Journal Citation Reports, its 2010 impact factor is 4.061. It was ranked 63rd out of 237 listed journals on Neurosciences, and 6th out of 48 listed journals in the category "Behavioral Sciences". == Article categories == The journal publishes these types of articles: ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:Scientific journals Category:Genetics Category:Psychiatry Category:Neuroscience
title: Genes, Brain and Behavior
